column2: my favorite already of the latest ramen joints to invade Houston. Flavorful broth with a variety of dishes to choose from; I'll be coming back again and again. I went for the Jinya Black Ramen. It's what made the chain famous
column3: and I can see why. The pork belly melted as soon as it my mouth! A good started for someone new to ramen.
